oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gospel Sing at Waycross Memorial Stadium (17687)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gospel music; Happy Goodman Family (Musical group); Kingsmen (Gospel group); Sego Brothers and Naomi; Robinson, Betty Jean; Telestials (Musical group); Wynn, Willie; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half-sheet (red and blue on white) announcing the World's Largest Annual Sun-Down to Sun-Up Gospel Sing featuring the Happy Goodman Family, the Kingsmen, Sego Brothers and Naomi, Betty Jean Robinson, the Telestials, the Vikings, and Willie Wynn and the Tennesseans at Waycross Memorial Stadium on August 24. Poster features a metal photoplate of the Happy Goodman Family. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/44074/
